GSP29vnyps52u:2: nyā. pa. prame. 9 atra yadyapi pramāviṣayaḥ prameyamiti vyutpattyā āropitākāravyavacchedārthayā anāropitarūpaṃ sarvaṃ prameyam,
GSP29vnyps52u:3: tathāpi niḥśreyasāntaraṅgatayā tadarthibhiḥ prakarṣeṇa meyaṃ prameyamiha vivakṣim /
GSP29vnyps52u:22: te ca śabdādayo guṇāḥ tadviśiṣṭāni ca /
GSP29vnyps52u:32: tatra sukhatatsādhanādikamapi viṣasaṃpṛktamadhuvat prabhūtānarthānuṣaṅgitvād duḥkhameva mumukṣuṇā bhāvyamiti tasyāpi pratikūlavedanīyatvam /
GSP29vnyps52u:36: etadeva ca prameyaṃ saṃgrahāccaturdhā vibhajya kecidanusaṃdadhate--- 'heyam,
GSP29vnyps52u:40: ye tu kaṇacaraṇādayaḥ ṣaṭsaptādirūpeṇa sarvān padārthān vibhajya parīkṣante,
GSP29vnyps52u:43: tatrāpi karmaṇaḥ saṃpratipannaguṇātiriktatvapakṣepi saṃskārādiguṇāvāntaraviśeṣavad guṇapakṣakakṣīkārāt dvau padārthau /
GSP29vnyps52u:46: mumukṣūṇāṃ pradhānatamaṃ tu prameyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ brahmaikameveti manvāno bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ--- “athāto brahmajijñāsā” ityupakramya tadeva saprakāraṃ nirūpitavān;
GSP29vnyps52u:48: kecittu dehātmavivekakramānusāreṇa “bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā” iti śrutiprakriyayā ca tridhā tattvaṃ vibhajya cintayanti,
GSP29vnyps52u:51: tadabhiprāyeṇa kālasya padārthaviśeṣaṇatayaiva samastavastupratītyantarbhāvānna pṛthagastitvādayo vaktavyāḥ,
GSP29vnyps52u:53_1: jainanirākaraṇasamaye bhāṣyakārairuktamātataśca brahmaikameva tattvamiti vā cidacidīśvarabhedena
GSP29vnyps52u:53_2: trīṇi tattvānīti vā paśyatāṃ na kaśvidviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29vnyps52u:57: ityādyanusāreṇa caturdhā pañcadhā vā vibhajya cintayatāṃ kāryaviśeṣaiḥ saha pañcaṣaṭsaptaviṃśatyādisaṃkhyāṃ niveśayatāṃ ca pūrvāviśeṣa eva /
GSP29vnyps52u:64: phalaṃ ceti kecit pañcadhā prameyaṃ parisaṃcakṣate /
GSP29vnyps52u:66: nyā. pa. prame. 10 athāyamaparaḥ pravṛttyarthaḥ saṃgrahonuṣṭhānaparihārāntaraṅgaḥ;
GSP29vnyps52u:76: nanvabhicārādikarmaṇāmanarthahetūnāṃ kṣudrapuruṣārthasādhanānāṃ ca kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kathaṃ hitatvam ?
GSP29vnyps52u:79_0: yo hi sukhaṃ duḥkhanivṛttiṃ cecchati tasya tatsādhanamapekṣamāṇasya laukikeṣu sādhaneṣu
GSP29vnyps52u:80: evaṃ kāmyakarmāṇi pāralaukikāni dṛṣṭajātīyatadadhikaphalārthatayā dṛṣṭānarthāvahasukhapravṛttipratibandhaupayikatvād hitānyeva rāgiṇām /
GSP29vnyps52u:89: ataśca mumukṣorapi rakṣakakṣatriyādyabhāve rākṣasādyabhibhave cātmarakṣaṇārthamabhicāraḥ kartavya eva,
GSP29vnyps52u:93: pāralaukikāni tu tatphalābhisaṃdhiviraheṇa karmayogānuṣṭhānadaśāyāṃ nityanaimittikairekīkṛtya kartavyāni /
GSP29vnyps52u:98: ata eva hi smaranti--- “śāstraṃ hi vatsalataraṃ mātāpitṛsahasrataḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps52u:102: ayameva ca paramo yogastrayyantānuvidhāyiṣu sarveṣu mokṣaśāstreṣu pratipādyate;
GSP29vnyps52u:103: yathāha bhagavān parāśaraḥ--- “ātmaprayatnasāpekṣā viśiṣṭā yā manogatiḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:106: smarati ca bhagavān śāṇḍilyarḥ--- “idṛśaḥ paramātmāyaṃ pratyagātmāva tathedṛśaḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:115: soyamevaṃvidhaḥ paramayogākhyo dharmaḥ “mayyeva mana ādhatsva” iti gīyate /
GSP29vnyps52u:117: “atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram /
GSP29vnyps52u:125: tena tatra siddhādhikārasyāpi śiṣṭatayā vyapadeśyasyāntargatātmajñānaḥ karmayoga eva kāryaḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:127: tādṛśenaiva ca karmayogena sukaratvādiguṇavatā cirataramanuṣṭhitena jñānayogavyavadhānamantareṇāpyātmāvalokanaṃ sidhyati /
GSP29vnyps52u:133: sarveṣu cāmīṣu parvasu tattatsāmagrīcakraghaṭanāya tattatphalapradānāya ca sa eva hi śaraṇamanusaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP29vnyps52u:134: tathā cāmananti--- “sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps52u:141: iha tu pramāṇacintāyāḥ paramaprayojanaṃ darśayituṃ prameyasya saṃgrahoktiḥ,
GSP29vnyps52u:143: nyā. pa. prame. 11 svātantryeṇa mitaṃ sukhetaratayā yadbhāti jantoridaṃ sarvaṃ yasya vibhūtirivyavasitaṃ svādaṃ vyanakti svakam /
GSP29vnyps52u:144: antaḥsvāntamanantanandathunidhirmedodṛśāṃ mādṛśā- māvirbhāvayatu svayaṃ sa bhagavānātmānamātmeśvaraḥ //
GSP29vnyps52u:145: yatrodāsata jaiminiprabhṛtayaḥ śrutyarthacintāparāḥ yasyāṃ kandalayanti mandamatayaḥ pāriplavān viplavān /
GSP29vnyps52u:146: viśveṣāmiha veṅkaṭeśaviduṣā viśrāntaye vādināṃ prācī nītiṣu paryaśodhi saraṇiḥ pracchāyaniṣkaṇṭakā //
GSP29vnyps52u:147: śuddhiṃ bibhrati mādṛśāṃ bhaṇitayaścūḍānvaye kevalaṃ prānte miśramabhāṇi nītinipuṇaiḥ kiṃ teṣvamantavyatā /
GSP29vnyps52u:148: yuktaṃ vargayuge vimṛśya saradhāpuṣpakramaṃ yauktikai- raṅgīkartumaśakyanihnavaguṇagrantho nibandho mama //
GSP29vnyps52u:150: ratiṃ bhajati bhāvanā layamivopayāti drutaṃ ramāvasumatīsahācaritadharmaṇi brahmaṇi //
GSP29vnyps52u:151: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameyādhyāye dvitīyamāhnikam //
